title: Ping from Indonesia to Oceania?
body:
Would anyone happen to know? Currently I'm playing on the NA from Indonesia and the best I can get ping wise is around 210. Would anyone happen to know what it is from Indonesia to Oceania? I would play on Garena Singapore but I don't want to start all over honestly.

I'm asking cause free transfers start tomorrow

replies.body:
I'm not sure about Indonesia but I'm currently on holidays in hong kong and I get 160 ping on NA and 150 ping on OCE.

But yeah as someone suggested below,  just make a level 1 account on OCE and play a bot or custom game to test the ping.
From what i have heard its around 190-210
easy to make a new account on OCE, call it Test Ping, and join a bot game. If you like the ping, transfer your main account.
lol it would be better here but I wouldn't be able to give you a number.
I can't give you numbers, but my Indonesian friend says he gets lower ping on NA than OCE.
